content.text:
# Border Wars (album)

| producer   =
| prev_title = Obey
| prev_year  = 2012
| next_title = Misfits
| next_year  = 2012
}}
Border Wars is a collaboration album between American rappers Berner and The Jacka. The album includes guest appearances from Rappin' 4-Tay, San Quinn, Liqz and Messy Marv.
